Policies and Initiatives.title: Tagbin’s Immersive Media Platform Finds Enterprise Niche In The AI Age
Policies and Initiatives.summary: Tagbin, an immersive technology and AI startup, has found a niche in the enterprise sector with its innovative platform. The company has worked on notable projects, including creating a virtual statue of Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose. Tagbin's platform is designed to provide immersive media experiences, leveraging AI and other technologies to drive engagement and interaction.

Events.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman likely to visit India in Feb: ChatGPT maker expected at India AI Impact Summit 2026 - What we know so far
Events.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is expected to visit India in mid-February for the India AI Impact Summit. The summit is scheduled to take place from February 16-20, 2026, at Bharat Mandapam in New Delhi, India. Altman's visit is anticipated as part of this event, although exact details are not yet confirmed.

Major AI Developments.title: CBDT awards ₹3000 crore contract to LTIMindtree for building AI-powered tax analytics platform
Major AI Developments.summary: The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) has awarded a ₹3000 crore contract to LTIMindtree for developing an AI-powered tax analytics platform. The project aims to enhance the Income Tax Department's analytical capabilities, enabling faster and more data-driven decision-making. This platform is expected to significantly improve the department's overall efficiency.

AI Start-Up News.title: 1Buy.AI raises Rs 32.5 Cr in seed round led by 100Unicorns
AI Start-Up News.summary: 1Buy.AI, a procurement and cost-reduction platform, has raised Rs 32.5 crore in a seed funding round led by 100Unicorns. The funding round also saw participation from other investors, including Ashish Kacholia and FJ Labs. The fresh funds will be used to accelerate the development of the company's SaaS platforms and expand global data pipes.
